sql.name: queryXhCarLoanApplyAuditList
sql.sqlString: select a.JK_LOAN_QUOTA,/*借款申请额度*/ a.LOAN_SCALE,/*借款成数（借款总额/车辆评估金额）*/ a.COMLPEX_MONEY,/*综合息费（IF(借款总额*总费率<1000,1000-利息,借款总额*总费率-利息)）*/ b.USER_NAME,/*借款人姓名*/ a.JK_CYCLE,/*借款周期*/ a.JK_TYPE,/*借款类型GPS移交*/ a.JK_LOAN_DATE,/*申请日期*/ a.BANK_CITY,/*开卡（省/市）*/ a.BANK_OPEN,/*账户开户行*/ a.BANK_USERNAME,/*账户名称*/ a.BANK_NUM,/*账户号码*/ a.ORGANI_ID,/*组织*/ a.CRMCITY,/*管辖城市(做查询依据)*/ a.CRMPROVINCE,/*管辖省份(做查询依据)*/ ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crmprovince ) as crmprovincename, a.TEAM_LEADER_ID,/*团队经理(做查询依据)*/ a.CUSTOMER_LEADER_ID,/*客户经理(做查询依据)*/ a.EMPLOYEE_SERVICE_STAFF,/*客服(做查询依据)*/ a.EMPLOYEE_SELLER,/*销售(做查询依据)*/ a.SUB_STATE,/*提交状态*/ a.STATE,/*借款申请流程状态，状态参考实体*/ a.LOAN_CODE,/*借款编号*/ a.IS_EXTENSION,/*是否展期*/ a.IS_HAVEEXTENSION,/*是否已展期*/ c.PLATE, /*车牌号码*/ a.BACKUP01,/*备用字段01*/ a.BACKUP02,/*备用字段02*/ a.BACKUP03,/*备用字段03*/ a.BACKUP04,/*备用字段04*/ a.BACKUP05,/*备用字段05*/ a.ID from XH_CAR_LOAN_APPLY a,xh_car_loan_user b,xh_car_message c where 1=1 and a.car_user_id = b.id and a.car_mess_id = c.id $sql

sql.name: queryXhCarLoanApplyAuditOverList
sql.sqlString:
select a.JK_LOAN_QUOTA,/*借款申请额度*/ a.LOAN_SCALE,/*借款成数（借款总额/车辆评估金额）*/ a.COMLPEX_MONEY,/*综合息费（IF(借款总额*总费率<1000,1000-利息,借款总额*总费率-利息)）*/ b.USER_NAME,/*借款人姓名*/ a.JK_CYCLE,/*借款周期*/ a.JK_TYPE,/*借款类型GPS移交*/ a.JK_LOAN_DATE,/*申请日期*/ a.BANK_CITY,/*开卡（省/市）*/ a.BANK_OPEN,/*账户开户行*/ a.BANK_USERNAME,/*账户名称*/ a.BANK_NUM,/*账户号码*/ a.ORGANI_ID,/*组织*/ a.CRMCITY,/*管辖城市(做查询依据)*/ a.CRMPROVINCE,/*管辖省份(做查询依据)*/ ( select name from base_city z where z.id=a.crmprovince ) as crmprovincename, a.TEAM_LEADER_ID,/*团队经理(做查询依据)*/ a.CUSTOMER_LEADER_ID,/*客户经理(做查询依据)*/ a.EMPLOYEE_SERVICE_STAFF,/*客服(做查询依据)*/ a.EMPLOYEE_SELLER,/*销售(做查询依据)*/ a.SUB_STATE,/*提交状态*/ a.STATE,/*借款申请流程状态，状态参考实体*/ a.LOAN_CODE,/*借款编号*/ a.IS_EXTENSION,/*是否展期*/ a.IS_HAVEEXTENSION,/*是否已展期*/ c.PLATE, /*车牌号码*/ a.BACKUP01,/*备用字段01*/ a.BACKUP02,/*备用字段02*/ a.BACKUP03,/*备用字段03*/ a.BACKUP04,/*备用字段04*/ a.BACKUP05,/*备用字段05*/ a.ID, t.CREDIT_TYPE, t.CREATE_TIME, t.CREDIT_RESULT, t.CREDIT_AUDIT_REPORT from (SELECT SINGLEAUDIT.* FROM XH_CAR_AUDIT SINGLEAUDIT WHERE SINGLEAUDIT.ID = (SELECT MAX(MULTIAUDITS.ID) FROM XH_CAR_AUDIT MULTIAUDITS WHERE MULTIAUDITS.CAR_APPLY_ID = SINGLEAUDIT.CAR_APPLY_ID $insql ) ) t, xh_car_loan_apply a,xh_car_loan_user b,xh_car_message c where 1 = 1 and t.car_apply_id = a.id and a.car_user_id = b.id and a.car_mess_id = c.id
$sql
order by t.create_time desc
